attributes.action: Lift the Saturday Football Blackout, and allow matches to continue at this time.
attributes.additional_details: People often miss important league or cup matches, with no alternative access to watch them.
attributes.background: Make it so that on Saturday, matches are still shown, no matter what league or cup, from 2:30 to 5:25, with no ban in place.

rejection.details: Decisions about when to hold and broadcast football matches are a matter for the FA, the Premier League and the Football League, and broadcasters, not the Government or House of Commons.
